example.name: decrypt-v
example.text: How would you know if you decrypted the correct one?

example.name: decryption-n
example.text: If it installs successfully, ransomware encrypts text files and displays a ransom note demanding 200 dollars to supply decryption software to restore the data to its original form.

example.name: decrypted-j
example.text: Here C is decrypted so the notification profile can be looked up to request the needed notification from the publishing-server.
